p: During the afore-described procedure, proteins were labelled with BGSN3. Finally, the immobilisation step for each sample via Huisgen reaction was carried out at 30 °C for 80 min, followed by a Washing step (20 min), in order to remove all the unbound molecules. This procedure was the same in the presence of the EcCFE. All measurements were performed in triplicates.
